selectStatements.query:
/* Gregorian - Year - Begin  */

SELECT '02'                              AS calendar_type,
       null                              AS driving_dim_code, 
       null                              AS dimension_value,    
       null                              AS dimension_value_code,    
       'Year'                            AS time_level,
       a.trailing_year_number            AS time_seq,
       TO_CHAR(a.cal_year_id)            AS time_value,
       a.trailing_year_number  + 1       AS yago_time_seq
  FROM
       dw_year_d a
 WHERE 
       a.trailing_year_number BETWEEN 0 and 19

/* Gregorian - Year - End */

UNION ALL  

/* Gregorian - Quarter - Begin */

SELECT  
       '02' as Calendar_Type,
       null                              AS driving_dim_code, 
       null                              AS dimension_value, 
       null                              AS dimension_value_code,  
       'Quarter'                         AS time_level,
       a.trailing_quarter_number         AS time_seq,
       a.cal_quarter_code                AS time_value,
       a.trailing_quarter_number + 4     AS yago_time_seq
  FROM
       dw_quarter_d a       
 WHERE a.trailing_quarter_number BETWEEN 0 AND 19 
 
/* Gregorian - Quarter - End */

UNION ALL

/* Gregorian - Month - Begin */

SELECT '02'                              AS calendar_type,
       null                              AS driving_dim_code, 
       null                              AS dimension_value,    
       null                              AS dimension_value_code,  
      'Month'                           AS time_level,
       a.trailing_month_number           AS time_seq,
       a.cal_month_code                  AS time_value,
       a.trailing_month_number + 12      AS yago_time_seq
  FROM
       dw_month_d a       
 WHERE a.trailing_month_number BETWEEN 0 AND 19

 /* Gregorian - Month - End */
